Package camzup.core

Class Curve3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.EntityData
camzup.core.Curve
camzup.core.Curve3
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICurve, IEntityData, IUtils, java.lang.Iterable<Knot3>
public class Curve3
extends Curve
implements java.lang.Iterable<Knot3>
Implements a composite piecewise cubic Bezier curve. Provides a function to retrieve a point and tangent on a curve from a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Curve3.Easing
    An easing function to facilitate animation between multiple curves.

    Transforms all knots in the curve by a matrix.
    Curve3 transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the curve permanently by a transform.

    Not to be confused with the temporary transformations applied by a curve entity's transform to the meshes contained within the entity.

    Useful when consolidating multiple curve entities into one curve entity.

      public Curve3 reframe​(Transform3 tr)
      Centers the curve about the origin, (0.0, 0.0), and rescales it to the range [-0.5, 0.5] . Emits a transform which records the curve's center point and original dimension. The transform's rotation is reset.

      Returns:
      this mesh

      public Curve3 toOrigin​(Transform3 tr)
      Centers the curve about the origin, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), by calculating its dimensions then subtracting the center point. Emits a transform which records the curve's center point. The transform's rotation and scale are reset.

      this mesh

    • arc

      public static Curve3 arc​(float startAngle, float stopAngle, float radius, ArcMode arcMode, Curve3 target)
      Creates an arc from a start and stop angle. The arc can be open, traversed by a chord, or pie-shaped.
      Parameters:
      startAngle - the start angle
      stopAngle - the stop angle
      radius - the arc radius
      arcMode - the arc mode
      target - the output curve
      Returns:
      the arc

    • calcBounds

      public static Bounds3 calcBounds​(Curve3 curve, Bounds3 target)
      Calculates an Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) encompassing the curve. Does so by taking the minimum and maximum of each knot's coordinate, fore handle and rear handle; not by finding the curve extrema.
      Parameters:
      curve - the curve
      target - the output dimensions
      Returns:
      the dimensions

    • eval

      public static Knot3 eval​(Curve3 curve, float step, Knot3 target)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a knot on the curve.
      Parameters:
      curve - the curve
      step - the step
      target - the output knot
      Returns:
      the knot

    • eval

      public static Ray3 eval​(Curve3 curve, float step, Ray3 ray)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a ray. The ray's origin will be a coordinate on the curve while its direction will be a normalized tangent.
      Parameters:
      curve - the curve
      step - the step
      ray - the output ray
      Returns:
      the ray
      See Also:
      eval(Curve3, float, Vec3, Vec3)

    • eval

      public static Vec3 eval​(Curve3 curve, float step, Vec3 coord, Vec3 tangent)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
      Parameters:
      curve - the curve
      step - the step
      coord - the output coordinate
      tangent - the output tangent
      Returns:
      the coordinate
      See Also:
      Knot3.bezierPoint(Knot3, Knot3, float, Vec3), Knot3.bezierTanUnit(Knot3, Knot3, float, Vec3)

    • evalFirst

      public static Transform3 evalFirst​(Curve3 curve, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)

      public static Vec3 evalFirst​(Curve3 curve, Vec3 coord, Vec3 tangent)

      tangent - the output tangent

    • fromCatmull

      public static Curve3 fromCatmull​(boolean closedLoop, Vec3[] points, float tightness, Curve3 target)
      Converts a set of points on a Catmull-Rom spline to a Bezier curve. The default tightness is 0.0. There must be at least 4 points in the array.
      Parameters:
      closedLoop - the closed loop flag
      tightness - the curve tightness
      points - the points
      target - the output curve
      Returns:
      the conversion
      See Also:
      Knot3.fromSegCatmull(Vec3, Vec3, Vec3, Vec3, float, Knot3, Knot3), Knot3.mirrorHandlesForward(), Knot3.mirrorHandlesBackward()

    • fromPoints

      public static Curve3 fromPoints​(boolean closedLoop, Vec3[] points, Curve3 target)
      Creates a curve from a series of points. Smoothes the fore- and rear-handles of each knot.
      Parameters:
      closedLoop - whether the curve is a closed loop
      points - the array of points
      target - the output curve
      Returns:
      the curve

    • random

      public static Curve3 random​(java.util.Random rng, int count, float lowerBound, float upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve3 target)
      Creates a random curve. Generates random points, creates a curve from those points, then smoothes the knots' handles.
      Parameters:
      rng - the random number generator
      count - the number of knots to generate
      lowerBound - the lower bound
      upperBound - the upper bound
      closedLoop - whether the curve is a closed loop
      target - the target curve
      Returns:
      the random curve
      See Also:
      Vec3.randomCartesian(Random, Vec3, Vec3, Vec3), fromPoints(boolean, Vec3[], Curve3)
